title: Understanding Artificial Neural Network-Based Early Design Support Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners Require Practical Understanding Based on Work Experience; Emphasis on Converting Complex Design Concepts into Mathematical Modeling

learning_goals: Explain the principles by which artificial neural networks (ANNs) process unstructured design knowledge
A multi-layer neural network structure can be utilized to implement an incremental design process
The impact of ANN-based systems on design alternative generation can be evaluated through real-world case analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
